channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree on verge blocking PROW., 20th December
item.description:
Southam Lane near to Kayte Lane. This has been reported before and closed. But the tree is still there and needs removing. Please provide an update before closing again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southam Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Utility trench sunken into highway, 20th December
item.description:
Approximately 25m back from the entrance to the Mira site. The nearside end of the trench is deeper and causes a banging when the car wheels go over it. Issue has been there for months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 108, Cromwell Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 20th December
item.description:
Customer reports a pothole at the location which has damaged their vehicle; they believe that it was previously attended to by Highways but has reopened. It is around 2ft by 1ft and 3-4" in depth.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -other CW10 problem, 20th December
item.description:
Carriage Rutting and Deptession 2 m x 1 m x 70mm Possible Sinkhole NWD / road closure adv Job was raised on 12 11 24 for a 4metre square Some of the patch has failed and the depth has gone from 55mm to over 70mm. A cone was left on but not sure whether it was Ringway or member of public. (CW10 Rutting&Depressions)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 20th December
item.description:
Temp lights are for pedestrians are being seen by drivers, and drivers are believing they are the only vehicles able to move at that time. When met with vehicles coming the other way on the mini roundabouts, they are not waiting and giving the correct right of way. This is making things dangerous. Can the pedestrian traffic lights be removed now?
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles
